description:
Welcome to quadcopter 101, the course that gives your a good understanding of a drone, its parts, how it flies and where and what to buy to build your own drone/quadcopter.

My videos show each part in details and I explain the use of those parts and give you details on how the part works. Don't worry I explain it in easy to understand terms.

I have included a detailed shopping list that lists out all the parts needed and show you where to buy them too.

I have broken down the course into intro, quick overview and individual parts break down. You can jump around any where in the course to learn each item independently.

The course not too long not too short at the end of the day, you will know the basics of a drone and be confident to star building your drone.

This "DESTIN2016" should bring down the price to $9. Only limited coupons available, so hurry up and grab them before they are gone!

Who is this course for?
  • This course is meant for hobbyists, students ,technology enthusiasts and all that want to build a well flying Drone for themselves or for a friend.
  • Anyone who wants to learn the basics and eventually build your own.
title: Quadcopter basics:Learn about drone parts and how they work
